Defender
When Essence Channeler enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Reborn 1–{3}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
